## R Markdown

```{eviews mychunk-,dev="t=pdf",prompt=T,dev.args="axis(b) font(40,b)",eval=TRUE,fig.cap="somefigure",fig.show="hide",fig.keep="all",fig.subcap=c("A figure","Another figure")}
wfcreate(wf=sagiru,page=mati) m 2000 2025
genr y=@cumsum(nrnd)
genr x=@cumsum(nrnd)
graph grap1.line x y
graph grap.line(m) x y
equation ols.ls y c x

wfsave mychunk
```

```{r }
mychunk$ols
```

# R plots

```{r label}
y=cumsum(rnorm(100))
x=cumsum(rnorm(100))

plot(x,y)
```

```{r eview-graph}
data=data.frame(y=runif(100),x=runif(100))
eviews_graph(data,save_path = "",frequency = "m",start_date = 1990,group = F,options = "m")

```
